trans-unit.source: Sets the identity of the user for an ASP.NET application when forms authentication is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Anger identitet för ett ASP.NET-program när formulär för autentisering är aktiverat.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen kan inte ärvas.

trans-unit.source: The FormsAuthenticationModule sets the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object that represents the user identity for the current request when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> in the [authentication Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) element of the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: FormsAuthenticationModule anger aktuellt <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen till ett <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objekt som representerar det användar-ID för aktuellt begäran när autentiseringen <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>anges till <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>i den [autentisering Element (inställningsschema för ASP.NET)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) element i programmets konfigurationsfil.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The FormsAuthenticationModule exposes an <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event that enables you to provide a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: FormsAuthenticationModule visar en <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>händelse som kan du ange ett anpassat <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objekt för <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>egenskapen för aktuellt <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is accessed by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>händelse nås genom att ange en subrutin med namnet **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** i filen Global.asax för ASP.NET-program.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In IIS 7.0, using the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> with the FormsAuthenticationModule is not supported.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I IIS 7.0, med hjälp av <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>med FormsAuthenticationModule stöds inte.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated modes, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om problem med programkompatibilitet i integrerat läge finns [flyttar ett ASP.NET-program från IIS 6.0 till IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Den här konstruktorn är inte avsedd att anropas från programkod.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET anropar den här konstruktorn för att skapa en instans av <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>klassen.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: After calling the constructor, it calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A> method to initialize the new <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> object.
trans-unit.target: När du anropar konstruktorn, anropar den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>metod för att initiera den nya <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>objektet.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application authenticates the current request.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när programmet autentiserar den aktuella begäranden.

trans-unit.source: The Authenticate event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: Autentisera händelsen uppstår under den <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>händelse.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the Authenticate event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Du kan hantera händelsen autentisera den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>klass genom att ange en subrutin med namnet **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** i filen Global.asax för ASP.NET-program.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs><xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property supplied to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan använda <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>egenskapen som angetts för den **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** händelsen för att ange den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>egenskapen för aktuellt <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>till en anpassad <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: Om du inte anger ett värde för den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>egenskapen under den **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** händelse, den identitet som tillhandahålls av biljetten för formulär för autentisering i cookie eller URL används.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication mode is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> in the [authentication Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) element of the application's configuration file and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: Den **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** händelsen aktiveras endast när autentiseringsläget är inställt på <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>i den [autentisering Element (inställningsschema för ASP.NET)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) element i programmets konfigurationsfil och <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>är en aktiva HTTP-modul för programmet.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources, other than memory, used by the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigör alla resurser, förutom minne som används av den <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden ska inte anropas från programkod.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initierar den <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden ska inte anropas från programkod.

trans-unit.source: The Init method ensures that the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is included in the processing of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> and <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> events.
trans-unit.target: Init-metoden garanterar att den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>ingår i bearbetningen av den <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>och <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>händelser.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Aktuellt <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"> </xref> instans.
